Blue sea and clear sky
Duan Xiaolie and his disciple left the Xia Pavilion with blood and flame under their steps,
just like the blood-stained, yet unwavering south mountain's bamboo.
They claim they are justice, crusading on a short path filled with corpses and blood.
We must stop this catastrophe veiled as justice that will soon be spread across the wulin.
It might be fast to achieve peace, by stopping killing with killing, but that is definitely not a long-term solution.
That is because in this world, there are only few absolute good and evil.
Mostly, there are just conflicts of standpoints, based on desire and distrust amongst the people.
If we can dissolve the standpoints, remove the estrangement, how many people would be unquestionably evil?
Only by letting people open their hearts and understand eachother can the continuation of this hatred be truly ended.
Lead the Wulin to become a peaceful world that treats people with kindness.
When  the dust settles, the work of rebuilding the Xia Pavilion begins.
You can't help feeling sad, about the destruction of what you knew, but you raise your head,
and you see those who share the same mind, working hard for the future wulin.
How can you stagnate here?
You look at the gateway, it reminds you of when your comrade and Master left,
those regretless silhouette, drenched in the blood-like scarlet, of the flame of combat and the setting sun...
... Right, no matter how much you have lost, and what more you will need to face,
you must not hold your steps back.
Everything is for not letting the hope of ending all conficts wither here.

Blazing Sun, Scorching Sky
「To accomplish great things, you must cast aside more than others」
Those were Duan Xiaolie's last words as he left the mountain.
Those words too, lifted the curtain for the blood bath that will sweep across the wulin.
As long as evil runs rampant, the blazing inferno will continue to burn against evil.
Remeber those fools who call themselves Xia, selfishly pursuing their hollow ideals.
Perhaps they are what Chu Tianabi said they are, white plum standing above the snow.
But because of that, they can never realize they fail to see the true suffering in this world.
This ends now.
From now on, killing will stop killing, fear will bring hope.
All the killing and hate, we will bear on our shoulders.
In vanquishing evil, there is no room for doubt.
When the dust settles, everyone followed Duan Xiaolie into the blood red sunset.
At that moment, amongst the flame of war, a breeze carried along a few white plums.
Don't look back "Those are what we have casted aside."
Duan Xiaolie's blood red silhouette is firm and determined.
Faces of those comrades who shares your ideal, show no regret on their faces.
......indeed, this is the path we've chosen.
No matter what we have casted aside in the past, no matter what we must face in the future.
Right now, we cannot stop.
All of this is to lead this chaotic world onto a right path.

Turning the tide
The belief to eliminate the evil, the ideology to save the world,
these are so remote, for most of the martial artist in this Jianghu,
In this Jianghu, what they seek, is the daring in delivering vengeance and justice,
and the joy of finding a soulmate by chance on the trip.
The Xia Pavilion, is different,
The Masters, wish that we would give more value to our martial art,
The disciples, search their own standard in the world during their study in the Pavilion.
They would not turn back,when they seek their ideals, and devote themselves in their ideology,
yet, they usually did not expect, what they would lose, on these dehumanizing paths.
Or, they already knew, but decided to leave it all behind to achieve their aim, no matter the cost...
No, Xia, should not be like this.
When ideologies, become a blade that tears through bonds, you already have an answer in your heart:
Even if it would deny what people believe in, you will stop this blade at all cost,
After that, you will gather others strength, take care of eachother, and defend eachother from the evil of the world.
No mountain would refuse dust to build its height, an ocean gathers every stream to make it wide,
You would drink together by the Poyang Lake, share one boat in tides and rain.
No matter what kind of ordeal will be ahead of you,
you will be helping eachother, and facing together.
This is the Xia Pavilion.
